projects.name: Hirehub
projects.description: Built a Fullstack application with React(Nextjs) and Node.js Implemented major functionalities like CRUD operations for Job posts,User Authentication, likes,premium user and more. Established user authentication and authorization for recruiters and candidates.

projects.name: React JS Portfolio
projects.description: Crafted a dynamic single-page application using React.js, integrating Bootstrap for sleek and responsive design elements alongside multiple routes for seamless navigation. Implemented routing functionalities to enable seamless navigation between different sections of the portfolio, enhancing user experience and accessibility making it more feasible than 90% of the current websites. Employed effective SEO techniques to improve the portfolio's visibility and ranking on search engines, ensuring increased discoverability to potential viewers by 87%. Utilized React hooks for streamlined state management and API fetching, facilitating the integration of dynamic content and personalized features to showcase adaptability and creativity in development.

experiences.description: Developed RegAdmin Hub, a Saas-application serving as a centralized hub for managing Regulations Constructed administrative tools that reduced regulatory management time by 40% through creation , updating, and efficient management of regulations Created RESTful API endpoints that trigger a Lambda function upon receiving POST requests, Employed debouncing to search function, boosting performance by minimizing redundant API calls by 70%.
